markdown:
* قام العالم الفرنسى باسكال بصياغة هذه النتيجة كما يلى : <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.473,t=0.076,r=0.933,b=0.106), with ID abd1987a-20ba-4afb-a4ea-125cfad09e30 -->

قاعدة (مبدأ) باسكال

عندما يؤثر ضغط على سائل محبوس في إناء فإن ذلك الضغط ينتقل بتـمامه إلى جميع أجزاء السائل كما ينتقل إلى جدران الإناء. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.084,t=0.110,r=0.930,b=0.191), with ID 7c2ffdfe-1373-429a-9637-9c47da47be3b -->

ملاحظة

* تخضع السوائل لقاعدة باسكال بينما لا تخضع الغازات لها،
لأن السوائل غيرقابلة للانضغاط فينتقل الضغط المؤثر عليها بتمامه إلى جميع أجزاء السائل. أما الغازات قابلة للانضغاط لوجود مسافات بينية كبيرة نسبياً بين جزيئات الغاز فيستهلك جزء من الشغل المبذول لضغط جزيئات الغازوبالتالي ينتقل الضغط جزئياً خلال الغازات. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.081,t=0.206,r=0.929,b=0.346), with ID 5d48497e-46b4-478f-a434-b2a89bbd614a -->

تطبيقات على قاعدة باسكال <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.646,t=0.365,r=0.934,b=0.399), with ID 894c4f70-73f5-4adb-a7f4-d6b64e5a6e35 -->

Summary : This image presents three examples of hydraulic systems and their applications, each illustrated with a photo and labeled in Arabic.

photo:
Scene Overview :
  • The image is divided into three vertical sections, each with a circular photo and a numbered colored dot (1, 2, 3).
  • Each section shows a different hydraulic application: a hydraulic piston, a hydraulic crane, and a hydraulic car brake.
  • The background is bright and clear, with each photo focusing on the relevant machinery.

Technical Details :
  • Section 1 (right): Shows a construction vehicle with a hydraulic piston in use, labeled "المكبس الهيدروليكي" (the hydraulic piston).
  • Section 2 (middle): Shows a crane lifting an object, labeled "الرافعة الهيدروليكية" (the hydraulic crane).
  • Section 3 (left): Shows a close-up of a car's disc brake system, labeled "الفرامل الهيدروليكية للسيارة" (the hydraulic car brake).
  • Each section is numbered in Arabic numerals (١, ٢, ٣) with colored circles (red for 1 and 2, blue for 3).

Spatial Relationships :
  • The three sections are arranged horizontally, each with its own image and label.
  • The images are centered within their sections, with text below each photo.

Analysis :
  • The figure visually compares three common uses of hydraulic systems: in pistons (for lifting/support), cranes (for heavy lifting), and car brakes (for stopping vehicles).
  • The layout emphasizes the diversity of hydraulic technology applications in industry and transportation. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.423,t=0.407,r=0.929,b=0.589), with ID 14af9283-0059-471c-8149-7f1635a2e434 -->

Summary : This image shows a dental clinic setting, specifically focusing on a dentist's chair and associated equipment.

photo:  
Scene Overview : 
  • Main subject is a modern dentist's chair with attached dental equipment, including an overhead light and instrument tray.
  • The setting appears to be a dental clinic room, with tiled walls and a clean, clinical environment.
  • The perspective is from the side, showing the full chair and two green-cushioned stools.
  • Lighting is bright and even, typical of a medical environment.
  • The colour palette is dominated by white, grey, and green tones.

Technical Details : 
  • No visible scale bar or magnification.
  • Arabic text below the image reads: "كرسي طبيب الأسنان" (translation: "Dentist's chair").
  • The image is circularly cropped and appears to be part of an educational or informational graphic, with a blue circled number "4" above.

Spatial Relationships : 
  • The dentist's chair is centrally placed, with stools positioned on either side.
  • Dental equipment is attached to the chair and positioned for easy access by the dentist.

Analysis : 
  • The image visually communicates the typical setup of a dental treatment area, highlighting the central role of the dentist's chair and its associated tools in patient care. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.249,t=0.407,r=0.429,b=0.588), with ID d2acae6f-f49c-4cd0-a308-94ce004f0f08 -->

Summary : This is a photograph showing the arm and bucket of a hydraulic excavator, with Arabic text labeling it as "الحفار الهيدروليكي" (the hydraulic excavator).

photo:
Scene Overview :
  • Main subject is the arm and bucket of a large yellow hydraulic excavator.
  • The excavator is photographed from a low angle against a blue sky with scattered clouds.
  • The image is circularly cropped and features a red dot with the number "5" at the top.

Technical Details :
  • No scale bar or measurement indicators are present.
  • Arabic text below the image reads "الحفار الهيدروليكي" (the hydraulic excavator).

Spatial Relationships :
  • The excavator arm and bucket dominate the foreground, extending diagonally from the upper left to the lower right.
  • The sky forms the background, providing contrast to the machinery.

Analysis :
  • The image visually highlights the mechanical structure and function of a hydraulic excavator, focusing on its digging component. The clear sky background emphasizes the machinery, making it the focal point of the image. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.085,t=0.411,r=0.261,b=0.586), with ID 115a8185-eb99-4304-9485-6f799b1e527a -->

وفيما يلي ستتعرض بشيء من التفصيل للمكبس الهيدروليكي. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.451,t=0.605,r=0.936,b=0.634), with ID b3b7fa2c-c51a-4902-82a3-946c7009faab -->

المكبس الهيدروليكى Hydraulic press <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.544,t=0.641,r=0.936,b=0.672), with ID a46219d4-6b03-450f-b6bf-50de49741cda -->

أنبوبة موصلة بمكبسين أحدهما صغير مساحة مقطعه a  
والآخر كبير مساحة مقطعه A ويمتلئ الحيز بين المكبسين  
بسائل مناسب (سائل هيدروليكي) كما بالشكل.

الحصول على قوة كبيرة تؤثر على المكبس الكبير باستخدام قوة صغيرة تؤثر على المكبس الصغير.

قاعدة باسكال. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.095,t=0.668,r=0.931,b=0.914), with ID 507f36a5-3a75-41f0-a0f5-507ded1b427a -->

$10.3$ <!-- marginalia, from page 0 (l=0.091,t=0.942,r=0.128,b=0.959), with ID a6b8d659-c618-4c31-a400-d7041d702615 -->
